blogPost.excerpt:
When the past lets you in, the truth will come out. Directed by Edgar Wright, watch the trailer for #LastNightInSoho. In theaters this October.

Edgar Wrightâ€™s psychological thriller about a young girl, passionate in fashion design, who is mysteriously able to enter the 1960s where she encounters her idol, a dazzling wannabe singer. But 1960s London is not what it appears, and time seems to fall apart with shady consequencesâ€¦

https://www.instagram.com/lastnightinsohomovie/ 
https://twitter.com/lastnightinsoho 
https://www.facebook.com/lastnightinsoho/ 
https://www.focusfeatures.com/last-night-in-soho
blogPost.body:
When the past lets you in, the truth will come out. Directed by Edgar Wright, watch the trailer for #LastNightInSoho. In theaters this October.

Edgar Wrightâ€™s psychological thriller about a young girl, passionate in fashion design, who is mysteriously able to enter the 1960s where she encounters her idol, a dazzling wannabe singer. But 1960s London is not what it appears, and time seems to fall apart with shady consequencesâ€¦

previous.excerpt:
Gain a new perspective on your life with our "Calendar & Timeline of Your Life Posters":
https://kgs.link/N3Ksfqvp

Sources & further reading:
https://sites.google.com/view/sources-tailend/

Wrapping your mind around your life is pretty hard, because you are up to your neck in it. It's like trying to understand the ocean while learning how to swim. On most days you are busy just keeping your head above water. So it is not easy to figure out what to do with your life and how to spend your time.

There are a million distractions. Your family, friends and romantic partners, boring work, and exciting projects. Video games to play and books to read. And then there is your couch that somebody needs to lie on. Itâ€™s easy to get lost. So let us take a step back and take a look at your life from the outside.

next.excerpt:
Jimmy Butler, ENOUGH IS ENOUGH! - Stephen A. reacts to Bucks vs. Heat Game 2 | First Take
Stephen A. Smith tries to fire up Jimmy Butler after the Miami Heat lost Game 2 to Giannis Antetokounmpo and the Milwaukee Bucks. 
0:00 Stephen A. sounds off on Butler. 
2:00 Molly Qerim Rose calls out Stephen A. for selfishly rooting for the Heat. 
2:30 Max Kellerman agrees that Jimmy Butler needs to play harder but highlights head coach Erik Spoelstra sitting Tyler Herro this postseason. 
#FirstTake #NBA
